check_alive: Check if the units are active
changin_value_info: OBS if a value is a decimal number \n use a dot (.) as decimal separator
show_info_archive_selected_recipe_error: Please select a recipe to archive
show_info_use_selected_recipe_error: The selected recipe contains no data
show_info_submit_new_recipe_error: Name and comment fields can not be empty
show_info_update_recipe_error: Please select a recipe to edit
show_info_update_recipe_name_empty: Name and comment fields can not be empty
show_info_edit_recipe_no_selected: Please select a recipe before trying to edit data
show_info_edit_recipe_no_data: Please select a recipe that contains data
show_info_all_units_proced_succes: The selected recipe has been saved to the database
show_info_all_units_proced_fail: Could not save data from all units to the database
no_recipe_to_load_data_into: No recipe or selected structure to load data into
show_info_error_loading_recipe: There was a error loading the recipe
show_info_Could_not_load_data_from: Try again, could not save data from
show_info_from_all_units_processed_succe: The selected recipe has been saved to the database
show_info_from_all_units_processed_not_s: Could not save data from all units to the database
show_info_to_all_units_processed_success: The selected recipe has been loaded into the Units
show_info_to_all_units_processed_not_suc: Could not load data to all units
error_with_database: There was a error with the database, check the logs for more information
show_info_opcua_connection_error: Could not connect to the OPCUA server, check the logs for more information
show_info_db_missing_values: The database is missing values, check the logs for more information
show_info_data_in_database_and_opcua_is_: The data in the database and OPCUA is the same
yes_no_mesg_box_save_data_to_recipe: Do you want to save data to the recipe?
yes_no_mesg_box_load_data_to_robot_cell: Do you want to load the data to the robotcell?
yes_no_mesg_box_delete_recipe: Do you want to delete the recipe?
